title: Vi hero First abilty ( Q ) bug or problem. need help to fix
body:
Hello,
I want to enquire about Vi ( hero ) i have been using and i believe there has been a change that has made her first ability more difficult to use and i am not sure what fault it is.

When i started using Vi last week i was able to smoothly use her first ablity with only like minimum 2 clicks now it takes minimum 4 clicks.

At first i just needed to left click mouse on ability 1 then click again on the floor until the charge goes the furthest i need and release the button i was holding on to for charging at opponent.

Now i have to left click on ability, left click on floor, left click to power charge and left click again to release to charge at opponent.

I am not sure why this is happening. Please send me some solutions. Thanks.
{{champion:254}}

replies.body: don't you love it when people who aren't even level 30 are complaining about champions, seriously. learn to deal with it, play differently, eyes its annoying but thats the game, seriously the meta and the game itself changes and if you can't change with it then you will be left behind and most likely not succeed swell as you normally could. just plain advice.

all u have to do is press q to activate it and it will charge up then click where u want to go u donthave to click t he icon. also if u dont want to click at all use smartcast (in the options menu) so u press q and hold then let go when u want to charge forward
But why cant we get back the other way which is much more easier?

Im used to the last old way in default cast how do i get it back? As it is more convenient for me.

Yes i know about smart cast and used it a bit since they have changed it But prefer old way still. Anyway to get it back? Thanks
I've been having issues with her q as well, but they've been hitbox issues. I've had better chances landing a nidalee spear than I have with hitting Vi's Q because of the retarded hitbox.
is this place going to fix the issue and change it back?
